codeRepository.title: Code Repository
codeRepository.description: Link to the repository where the un-compiled, human readable code and related code is located (SVN, github, CodePlex)

runtime.title: Runtime
runtime.description: Runtime platform or script interpreter dependencies (Example - Java v1, Python2.3, .Net Framework 3.0)

sampleType.title: Sample Type
sampleType.description: Full (compile ready) solution, code snippet, inline code, scripts, template.
